OOC: Just a quick question and note.

You had Tuscon leap from a kneeling/s=
ubmissive position and dodge
three attacks from the Dinobots who were at po=
int blank range and
another one putting out an Earthquake?

Please don't fo=
rget that the Dinobots can take on combiner teams with
a reasonable chance =
of success and even Optimus Prime and Megatron
were loath to take them on.
=

Think about how powerful the Dinobots were on TF Animated. They were
not t=
he smartest, but the could hand anyone their aft on the regular.
These are =
more like G1 comics in ability, but you can get the idea.

- Preston
